chapters.title: Fa Hui You Fen Di Yi
chapters.summary: Describes the origin of the Dharma assembly.

chapters.title: Shan Xian Qi Qing Fen Di Er
Da Cheng Zheng Zong Fen Di San
Miao Xing Wu Zhu Fen Di Si
Ru Li Shi Jian Fen Di Wu
chapters.summary: Cannot see Tathagata by physical marks.

verses.chinese: Thus I have heard. At one time the Buddha was in Jeta Grove.
verses.english: Thus have I heard. At one time the Buddha was dwelling in the Jeta Grove at Sravasti.

verses.chinese: Then the venerable Subhuti rose from his seat.
verses.english: Then the venerable Subhuti rose from his seat, bared his right shoulder, and addressed the Buddha.

verses.chinese: World-Honored One! How should one set forth bodhicitta?
verses.english: World-Honored One, how should those who bring forth bodhicitta dwell and tame their minds?

verses.chinese: All bodhisattva-mahasattvas should thus subdue their minds.
verses.english: All bodhisattva-mahasattvas should subdue their minds like this, guiding every being to liberation without grasping at beings.

concepts.name: Sunyata
concepts.description: Emptiness, dependent origination of all phenomena.
